name: elpjidm

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cho))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ ran(projh), (c0 ∘ c0)= c0, c0 ∈ HrmOp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→(c0 ∘ c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)↔(c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧(c0 ∘ c0)= c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→(c0 ∘ c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)↔(c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧(c0 ∘ c0)= c0))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c0), c0)))

comment: A projection operator is idempotent. Part of Theorem 26.1 of [Halmos] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
